benchmark_details.name: EditRoom-DB
benchmark_details.overview: EditRoom-DB is a large-scale dataset for language-guided 3D scene layout editing that includes 83k editing pairs generated through an automatic data augmentation pipeline, facilitating comprehensive training and evaluation of methods for natural language command-based scene manipulation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a robust dataset for evaluating and training models in the field of language-guided 3D scene editing.

data.source: Generated through an automatic data augmentation pipeline based on the existing 3D scene synthesis datasets.
data.annotation: Automatically paired editing operations with natural language descriptions.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on comparisons between generated scenes and target scenes.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment and accuracy in scene editing.
methodology.baseline_results: EditRoom outperformed baselines across all metrics.
methodology.validation: Validated through comparisons against existing state-of-the-art models.
